com.craftfire.commons.yaml
Interface YamlManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleYamlManager, YamlCombiner
public interface YamlManager

An interface for all kinds of yaml managers.

Method Summary

exist

boolean exist(String node)
Checks if node with given path exists in the manager.

Parameters:
node - the node path to check
Returns:
true if exists, false otherwise

getBoolean

boolean getBoolean(String node)
Returns boolean value of node with given path.

Defaults to false if the node doesn't exist or can't be converted to boolean.

Parameters:
node - the node path
Returns:
boolean value of the node or false if not found or can't be converted

                   boolean defaultValue)
Returns boolean value of node with given path.

Parameters:
node - the node path
defaultValue - the default value to use if the node doesn't exist or can't be converted to boolean
Returns:
boolean value of the node or defaultValue if not found or can't be converted

addNodes

void addNodes(YamlManager yamlManager)
              throws YamlException
Adds all nodes from given YamlManager to this manager's document.

Parameters:
yamlManager - the YamlManager to take nodes from
Throws:
YamlException - if the root node of the document is a scalar

addNodes

void addNodes(Map<String,Object> map)
              throws YamlException
Adds all nodes from given map to this manager's document.

Parameters:
map - map of nodes to add
Throws:
YamlException - if the root node of the document is a scalar

setNode

void setNode(String node,
             Object value)
             throws YamlException
Sets node with the given path to given value.

Parameters:
node - the node path
value - the value to set
Throws:
YamlException - if one of path elements is a scalar node

                 throws YamlException

Parameters:
node - the node path
Returns:
the YamlNode
Throws:
YamlException - if one of path elements is a scalar node

getNodes

@Deprecated
Map<String,Object> getNodes()
Deprecated. 

Returns a map of the values of all the final nodes. The map key is the node path, the map value is the node value.

Returns:
a map of values of all the final nodes

getFinalNodeList

List<YamlNode> getFinalNodeList()
Returns list of all scalar nodes loaded by the manager.

Returns:
list of all scalar nodes

getFinalNodeCount

int getFinalNodeCount()
Returns total number of all scalar nodes loaded by the manager.

Returns:
number of all scalar nodes

save

boolean save()
Saves the manager's document to the file it was loaded from.

Fails if the document wasn't loaded from a file or IOException occurred.

Returns:
true if succeed, false otherwise

load

boolean load()
Loads the manager's document.

Fails if trying to load the document from a stream or a reader more than once, or IOException occurred.

Returns:
true if succeed, false otherwise
